select date, ifnull(count(*), 0)as housesNum, ifnull(sum(cellNumDN001), 0)as cellNumDN001, ifnull(sum(cellNum), 0) as cellNum from (select a.houses_no, a.cellNumDN001, b.cellNum, a.date from (select h.houses_no, a.cellNumDN001, year(h.modified_time)as date from tb_houses h left join (select houses_no, count(houses_no)as cellNumDN001, date from (select h.houses_name, h.houses_no, year(h.modified_time)as date, c.cell_name, c.comp_id from tb_houses h left join tb_comp_price c on c.houses_no = h.houses_no)a where a.cell_name is not null and a.comp_id = 'dn001' group by houses_no)a on a.houses_no = h.houses_no)a left join (select h.houses_no, a.cellNum, year(h.modified_time)as date from tb_houses h left join (select houses_no, count(houses_no)as cellNum, date from (select h.houses_name, h.houses_no, year(h.modified_time)as date, c.cell_name, c.comp_id from tb_houses h left join tb_comp_price c on c.houses_no = h.houses_no)a where a.cell_name is not null and a.comp_id <> 'dn001' group by houses_no)a on a.houses_no = h.houses_no)b on a.houses_no = b.houses_no)b group by date

select date, count(*)as housesNum, sum(cellNumDN001)as cellNumDN001, sum(cellNum) as cellNum from (select a.houses_no, a.cellNumDN001, b.cellNum, quarter(a.date)as date from (select h.houses_no, a.cellNumDN001, h.modified_time as date from tb_houses h left join (select houses_no, count(houses_no)as cellNumDN001, date from (select h.houses_name, h.houses_no, h.modified_time as date, c.cell_name, c.comp_id from tb_houses h left join tb_comp_price c on c.houses_no = h.houses_no)a where a.cell_name is not null and a.comp_id = 'dn001' group by houses_no)a on a.houses_no = h.houses_no)a left join (select h.houses_no, a.cellNum, h.modified_time as date from tb_houses h left join (select houses_no, count(houses_no)as cellNum, date from (select h.houses_name, h.houses_no, h.modified_time as date, c.cell_name, c.comp_id from tb_houses h left join tb_comp_price c on c.houses_no = h.houses_no)a where a.cell_name is not null and a.comp_id <> 'dn001' group by houses_no)a on a.houses_no = h.houses_no)b on a.houses_no = b.houses_no where year(a.date) = #{year})b group by date
